mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.token AS "token", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.admin_id AS "adminId", a.expire_time AS "expireTime", a.status AS "status", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.remark1 AS "remark1", user.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_token( id, token, user_id, admin_id, expire_time, status, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, remark1 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{token}, #{user.id}, #{adminId}, #{expireTime}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{remark1} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_token SET token = #{token}, user_id = #{user.id}, admin_id = #{adminId}, expire_time = #{expireTime}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, remark1 = #{remark1} WHERE id = #{id}
